name: Champion Dual Blades
description: Fortified dual blades designed for Rampage defense. They res- pond to one's desire to protect.

description: Fortified dual blades designed for Rampage defense. They res- pond to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Dual Blades II
description: Fortified dual blades designed for Rampage defense. They res- pond to one's desire to protect.

description: Used by village defenders, these dual blades fortify one's power to protect like castle walls.

description: Blades that turn you into a twister of bladed death. Reward for Kamura's savior.

name: Kamura Warrior Blades+
description: Blades that turn you into a twister of bladed death. Reward for Kamura's savior.

name: Duke's Cleavers
description: Chillingly sharp Malzeno dual blades. Just a few cuts bring full exsanguination.

name: Bloody Nails Wunde
description: Blood-thirsty evil swords. They glisten brilliantly in the spray that they cause.

name: Mud Ripper II
description: Almudron dual blades with a spinning mechanism that can even tear through mud.

name: Mud Ripper I
description: Almudron dual blades with a spinning mechanism that can even tear through mud.

name: Mud Twister
description: Through much research, the spinning blades' destructive power has become explosive.

name: Mud Slicers
description: Through much research, the spinning blades' destructive power has become explosive.

name: Mud Shredders
description: Further muddy enhancements create destructive cutting power that's beyond belief.

name: Magma Shredders
description: Upgraded Magma Slicers. These circular silver blades slice everything to pieces.

name: Usurper's Fulgur I
description: Dual blades with a Zinogre's might. Only true courage can awaken the monarch's fangs.

name: Magma Slicers+
description: Gorgeous circular dual blades. These rings can split the very ground.

description: Gorgeous circular dual blades. These rings can split the very ground.

name: Despot's Blitz+
description: Fangs fit to rule the world taken shape as the upgrade of the Usurper's Fulgur.

name: Blizzarioths I
description: Dual blades made from claws, tusks, and Barioth breath. Freeze anything they touch.

name: Mountain Blizzarioths

name: Flame Blizzard
description: Attacks from these Blizzarioth's upgrade trap prey like an inescapable blizzard.

name: Blizzarioths II
description: Dual blades made from claws, tusks, and Barioth breath. Freeze anything they touch.

name: Flame Blizzard+
description: Attacks from these Blizzarioth's upgrade trap prey like an inescapable blizzard.

description: A flurry of blows from these furious blades leaves prey as a flurry of snow.

description: Dual blades laced with poison. It may be dirty, but if you want to win...

name: Desperado II
description: Dual blades laced with poison. It may be dirty, but if you want to win...

name: The Kid
description: New and improved with two types of poison! No trick is beneath you now.

name: The Legend
description: Dual blades that mix two types of poison to deadly effect. Handle with care!

description: Daggers made with real bloodlust. The lightning they emanate terrifies prey.

name: The Kid+
description: New and improved with two types of poison! No trick is beneath you now.

description: Upgraded iron dual blades of reliable sharpness and might, generating all-consuming storms.

description: Like a bloodthirsty Tigrex, the gore of many a foe clings to these grim blades.

description: Shining radiantly at dawn, these blades bestow their owner with prosperity.

description: The Morning Dawn's upgraded form, their cuts are as clean as a fresh, new beginning.

description: Aknosom dual blades, personifying the sun's piercing rays. Conquer all with an unruly soul.

description: Dual blades made out of a Kulu-Ya-Ku beak. Rough, but sturdy—a big hit.

description: Dual blades made out of a Kulu-Ya-Ku beak. Rough, but sturdy—a big hit.

name: Kulu's Lasher+
description: Dual blades that take out two Kulus with one stone, being both light and strong.

description: These Lunagaron dual blades yearn to slice and dice prey with their glistening red claws.

description: Dual blades once used to cut metal in a workshop. Crafted with advanced techniques.

description: The forelimbs of a Rajang. With a quick, golden flash, the target's life expires.

description: Give in to rage. Fear not death as you dance into a storm of devastation.

description: The winds twain whip up a storm of such fury, even the gods are blinded.

name: Bazelhound Rookslayer
description: Give in to rage. Fear not death as you dance into a storm of devastation.

name: Double Discharge

name: Daora's Hook
